code: import React from'react';import axiosOrder from'../../../../axios-orders';import Button from'../../../UI/Button/Button';import'./OrdersItem.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var OrdersItem=function OrdersItem(props){var openPdfInvoice=function openPdfInvoice(){axiosOrder.get("/orders/".concat(props.orderId),{responseType:'blob',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(props.token),UserId:"".concat(props.userId)}}).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){var file=new Blob([res.data],{type:'application/pdf'});var fileUrl=URL.createObjectURL(file);window.open(fileUrl);}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"orders__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"orders__item-lines",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"order__number",children:["Order #",props.orderId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"orders__products",children:[props.orderProducts.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"orders__products-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Product: "}),product.product.title," (",product.quantity,")",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Price:"})," $",product.product.price]})]})},product._id);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"order__price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Total Price: US$ ",props.orderPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonClass:"order__link",clicked:function clicked(){openPdfInvoice();},isEnabled:true,children:"Invoice"})})]})]})]})},props.orderKey);};export default OrdersItem;
